document.full_text: the 2011 atlantic hurricane season will be above average in activity and there is a more than 70 percent chance of at least one major hurricane hitting the u.s. coastline, colorado state university forecasters predicted on wednesday.
document.title: high chance major hurricane will hit u.s. in 2011: csu
lines_and_colors: the 2011 atlantic hurricane season will be above average in activity and there is a more than 70 percent chance of at least one major hurricane hitting the u.s. coastline, colorado state university forecasters predicted on wednesday.
